To edit multiple accounts on-screen:

  1. Click on the Manage Accounts button.
  2. Use the Filter and Search options to find the students you would like to edit.
  3. Use the tick boxes to select your students.
  4. You then have the option to: edit the Registration Year and Class, set the students as leavers and delete the accounts.
